reviews.review_msg: Coleman is such an awesome prof! She is incredibly sweet, I took her class in my first semester and she helped me a lot! She really cares about her students and about the subject matter,. She also gives incredibly interesting lectures, I never dreaded going to her class! I definitely want to take another class with her soon!

Coleman is an amazing professor! If you take a class with her, you will not regret it! She tries her best to get to know her students and is very helpful when it comes to providing feedback. That being said, be prepared to engage with the material during class, so do your readings!
